mapper.select: SELECT ENAME, E_JOB FROM EMP WHERE EMPNO = #{empno}
SELECT ATT_CODE FROM ( SELECT ATT_CODE FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE EMPNO = #{empno} ORDER BY ATT_CODE DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ATTENDANCE ( ATT_CODE, GO_WORK, EMPNO ) SELECT 'ATT_' || LPAD(NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(ATT_CODE, 5))), 0) + 1, 3, '0'), CURRENT_DATE, #{empno} FROM ATTENDANCE
mapper.update: UPDATE ATTENDANCE SET OUT_WORK = CURRENT_DATE, WORKING_STATUS = CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(GO_WORK, 'HH24:MI:SS') > '09:10:00' THEN 2 WHEN GO_WORK IS NULL OR GO_WORK = CURRENT_DATE THEN 3 ELSE 1 END WHERE ATT_CODE = #{attCode} AND EMPNO = #{empno}
mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(GO_WORK, 'HH24:MI') AS GO_WORK FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE GO_WORK >= TRUNC(CURRENT_DATE) AND EMPNO = #{empno} ORDER BY GO_WORK DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY
SELECT TO_CHAR(OUT_WORK, 'HH24:MI') AS OUT_WORK FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE OUT_WORK >= TRUNC(CURRENT_DATE) AND EMPNO = #{empno} ORDER BY OUT_WORK DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY
SELECT COUNT(*) AS NOMAL_COUNT FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE WORKING_STATUS = 1 AND EMPNO = #{empno}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS LATE_COUNT FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE WORKING_STATUS = 2 AND EMPNO = #{empno}
SELECT ROUND(SUM(OUT_WORK - GO_WORK) * 24) AS WORKING_DAYS FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE TO_CHAR(GO_WORK, 'YYYYMM') = TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE, 'YYYYMM') AND EMPNO = #{empno}

SELECT ROUND(SUM( CASE WHEN OUT_WORK - GO_WORK > (FIX_TIME - TRUNC(FIX_TIME)) THEN OUT_WORK - GO_WORK - (FIX_TIME - TRUNC(FIX_TIME)) ELSE 0 END) * 24) AS OVER_TIME FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE TO_CHAR(GO_WORK, 'YYYYMM') = TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE, 'YYYYMM') AND EMPNO = #{empno}

SELECT 12- ROUND(SUM( CASE WHEN OUT_WORK - GO_WORK > (FIX_TIME - TRUNC(FIX_TIME)) THEN OUT_WORK - GO_WORK - (FIX_TIME - TRUNC(FIX_TIME)) ELSE 0 END) * 24) AS CAN_OVER_TIME FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE TO_CHAR(GO_WORK, 'YYYYMM') = TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE, 'YYYYMM') AND EMPNO = #{empno}

SELECT TO_CHAR(GO_WORK, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS WORKING, TO_CHAR(GO_WORK, 'DY') AS DAY, TO_CHAR(GO_WORK, 'HH24:MI') AS WORKING_TIME, TO_CHAR(OUT_WORK, 'HH24:MI') AS OUT_TIME, CASE WHEN WORKING_STATUS = 1 THEN '정상출근' WHEN WORKING_STATUS = 2 THEN '지각' WHEN WORKING_STATUS = 3 THEN '결근' END AS WORKING_STATUS FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE EMPNO = #{empno} ORDER BY GO_WORK DESC FETCH FIRST 5 ROW ONLY

SELECT TO_CHAR(GO_WORK, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS WORKING, TO_CHAR(GO_WORK, 'DY') AS DAY, TO_CHAR(GO_WORK, 'HH24:MI') AS WORKING_TIME, TO_CHAR(OUT_WORK, 'HH24:MI') AS OUT_TIME, CASE WHEN WORKING_STATUS = 1 THEN '정상출근' WHEN WORKING_STATUS = 2 THEN '지각' WHEN WORKING_STATUS = 3 THEN '결근' END AS WORKING_STATUS FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE EMPNO = #{empno} ORDER BY GO_WORK DESC

SELECT EVENT_NAME, TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD(DY) HH24:MI')AS START_DAY, TO_CHAR(END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD(DY) HH24:MI')AS END_DAY, ROUND((END_DATE - START_DATE) * 24, 2) AS TOTAL_DURATION, PARTICIPANT, RESOURCE_CONTENT FROM SCHEDUL_FOR_RESOURCE WHERE EMPNO = #{empno} ORDER BY START_DAY DESC FETCH FIRST 5 ROW ONLY
SELECT SCHEDULE_CODE FROM SCHEDUL_FOR_RESOURCE WHERE EMPNO = #{empno}
SELECT PARTICIPANT , RESOURCE_CONTENT FROM SCHEDUL_FOR_RESOURCE WHERE EMPNO = #{empno}

SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VACATION FROM DOC_ANNUAL_LEAVE AL , SGN_DOC SC WHERE AL.DOC_NO = SC.DOC_NO AND DAL_TYPE = '연차' AND TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'YYYYMM') = TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE, 'YYYYMM') AND SC.WRITER_NO = #{writerNo}

SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_HALF_VACATION FROM DOC_ANNUAL_LEAVE AL , SGN_DOC SC WHERE AL.DOC_NO = SC.DOC_NO AND DAL_TYPE = '반차' AND TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'YYYYMM') = TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE, 'YYYYMM') AND SC.WRITER_NO = #{writerNo}

SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN DAL_TYPE = '반차' THEN 0.5 ELSE 1 END) AS ALL_VACATION FROM DOC_ANNUAL_LEAVE AL, SGN_DOC SC WHERE AL.DOC_NO = SC.DOC_NO AND SC.WRITER_NO = #{writerNo} AND TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'YYYYMM') = TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE, 'YYYYMM')

SELECT DAL_TYPE, TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS START_DATE, TO_CHAR(END_DATE, 'MM/DD') AS END_DATE, CASE WHEN DAL_TYPE = '연차' THEN '' ELSE TO_CHAR(START_TIME) END AS START_TIME, CASE WHEN DAL_TYPE = '연차' THEN '' ELSE TO_CHAR(END_TIME) END AS END_TIME, LEAVE_REASON FROM DOC_ANNUAL_LEAVE AL, SGN_DOC SC WHERE AL.DOC_NO = SC.DOC_NO AND TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'YYYYMM') = TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE, 'YYYYMM') AND SC.WRITER_NO = #{writerNo} ORDER BY START_DATE DESC FETCH FIRST 5 ROW ONLY

SELECT DAL_TYPE, TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS START_DATE, TO_CHAR(END_DATE, 'MM/DD') AS END_DATE, CASE WHEN DAL_TYPE = '연차' THEN '' ELSE TO_CHAR(START_TIME) END AS START_TIME, CASE WHEN DAL_TYPE = '연차' THEN '' ELSE TO_CHAR(END_TIME) END AS END_TIME, LEAVE_REASON FROM DOC_ANNUAL_LEAVE AL, SGN_DOC SC WHERE AL.DOC_NO = SC.DOC_NO AND TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'YYYYMM') = TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE, 'YYYYMM') AND SC.WRITER_NO = #{writerNo}
